Blender can be used as a food processor to make smoothies, soups, and sauces.
Blender can be used as a grinder to make flour, sugar, and spices.
Blender can be used as a mixer to make batter, dough, and cakes.
Blender can be used as a blender to mix ingredients for cocktails and mocktails.
Blender can be used as a tool toze tea leaves by blending them for a few seconds toze the tea.
